00185   {
00186     if (!isOptDefined(name, oI)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}

00223   void setOptions(PgOptions &opts) {
00224       for(unsigned int i=0; i<opts.m_option_vec.size(); i++)
00225           if(opts.m_option_vec[i]->isSet())
00226                 m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(opts.m_option_vec[i]->m_longName)->m_values = opts.m_option_vec[i]->m_values;
00227   }
00228 
00229   int snapshotOptions() {
00230       std::string empty;
00231       return snapshotOptions(empty);
00232   }
00233 
00234   int snapshotOptions(const std::string &label){
00235       int index = int(m_Options.size());
00236       m_Options.push_back(m_Options[0]);
00237       if(label != "")
00238         m_Labels[label] = index;
00239       return index;
00240   };
00241
